casebody.data:
Somen SHIPMAN
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 14, 2017

Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

C. Robert Satti, Jr., supervisory assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Somen Shipman's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 600, 161 A.3d 585 (2017), is denied.
